{{Infobox Underground Item |name = Fossilized Drake |image = [[File:Fossilized Drake.png|200px]] |caption = In-Game image of the ''Fossilized Drake''. |location =
*[[Underground]] *[[Berry Master]] }} ==Description== The '''Fossilized Drake''' is a type of [[Fossils|Fossil part]]. ==Details== '''Fossilized Drake''' can be combined in the fossil master of Galar to create a new Pok√©mon. ==Mine Layout== The Fossilized Drake appears in the Underground as a 5x4 sized object.

[[File:FossilizedDrakeMine.png|100px]] ==Uses== {|class="wikitable sortable" ! Location !! Fossils !! Reward!! Cost |- | rowspan=2|[[Shops#Galar|Stow-on-Side Fossil Trader]] || 1x Fossilized Drake [[File:Fossilized Drake.png|30px]]
1x [[Fossilized Bird]] [[File:Fossilized Bird.png|30px]] || [[File:Dracozolt.png|40px]] Dracozolt || rowspan=2|25,000 {{Questpoints}} |- | 1x Fossilized Drake [[File:Fossilized Drake.png|30px]]
1x [[Fossilized Fish]] [[File:Fossilized Fish.png|30px]] || [[File:Dracovish.png|40px]] Dracovish |} ==Acquisition== The Fossilized Drake can be found in the [[Underground]] and traded for with the [[Berry Master|Hoenn Berry Master]].
{{Underground Items}} [[Category:Items]] [[Category:Fossils]]
